October 27, 2024 - Kayser-Roth Corporation (a subsidiary of Golden Lady Company) is an underwear and hosiery manufacturer based in Greensboro, North Carolina. The company currently markets three owned brands in North America: No Nonsense, Hue, and Burlington.
